inclusion.criterion: age-and sex-matched apparently healthy control subjects
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: personal history of any atherosclerotic vascular disease (myocardial infarction, angina pectoris, peripheral arterial disease, aortic disease, transient ischemic attack or ischemic stroke)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: chronic kidney disease stage 3 and above
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 46-year-old man with dizziness and frequent headaches, family history of CAD, but no other cardiovascular risk factors. Severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery.
